result.title: Code Monk: Dynamic Programming
result.content:
Code Monk, a weekly series of tutorials on various topics followed by a short programming challenge to test your understanding has this week Dynamic Programming for all of you guys.

Problems of various difficulty level in contest are related to Dynamic Programming in one way or the other ;)

Contest is on August 19, 2015 09:00 IST and will be live for 2.30 hours. The link to the contest: Code Monk: Dynamic Programming

The setter of the contest is: gorv and the tester and editorialist is: Xsquare. We have worked extremely hard on making this contest a unique experience for people who want to strengthen their concepts of Dynamic Programming. Also I want to thanks belowthebelt for writing this awesome tutorial to learn about Dynamic Programming

So Register for the contest, show your love for Dynamic Programming. There are T-Shirts for top 3.

Good luck to everyone, and have fun! :)

Always Keep in mind : Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it :D

Reminder : Hope you are all set for today's contest :) Any kind of feedbacks you want to share after the contest are always welcomed.
